revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Mt. Mortar |image = [[File:Mt Mortar.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of Mt Mortar. |tokens = 5,500 |location = On route 42, east of Ecruteak City. }} '''Mt. Mortar''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]]. It initially has 36 tiles arranged in a 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 104,100 HP. The first time you clear this dungeon you will be awarded with a [[Fighting Egg|Fighting egg]].
== Tables des rencontres == === Rencontres sauvages ===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata || rowspan=2|[[File:PokéManiac.png|40px]] PokéManiac Miller || rowspan=2|[[File:Nidoking.png|40px]] Nidoking, [[File:Nidoqueen.png|40px]] Nidoqueen |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat |- | [[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude || rowspan=2|[[File:Super_Nerd.png|40px]] Super Nerd Markus || rowspan=2|[[File:Slowpoke.png|40px]] Slowpoke |- | [[File:Marill.png|40px]] Marill |- | [[File:Raticate.png|40px]] Raticate || rowspan=3|[[File:Super_Nerd.png|40px]] Super Nerd Hugh || rowspan=3|[[File:Seadra.png|40px]] Seadra |- | [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat |- | [[File:Graveler.png|40px]] Graveler |- |}
===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Tyrogue.png|40px]] '''Tyrogue*''' ||
420,000 || rowspan=3|[[File:Black_Belt.png|40px]] Black Belt Kiyo || [[File:Hitmonlee.png|40px]] Hitmonlee, [[File:Hitmonchan.png|40px]] Hitmonchan ||
210,000 |}
'''*Note: Must have cleared Mt Mortar once'''
==Objets== ===Sans Perte de Bonus===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xAttack}} || 6 || 64.26% || 61.71% || 51.43% |- | {{Pokemon|Graveler}} || N/A || 10.71% || 10.29% || 8.57% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Green Shard}} || N/A || 10.00% || 10.50% || 12.47% |- | {{Bag2|Grey Shard}} || N/A || 10.00% || 10.50% || 12.47% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Iron Plate}} || N/A || 1.00% || 1.30% || 2.50% |- | {{Bag2|Stone Plate}} || N/A || 1.00% || 1.30% || 2.50% |- | {{Bag2|Earth Plate}} || N/A || 1.00% || 1.30% || 2.50% |- | {{Bag2|Draco Plate}} || N/A || 1.00% || 1.30% || 2.50% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Ultraball}} || N/A || 0.33% || 0.53% || 1.33% |- | {{Bag2|Large Restore}} || N/A || 0.33% || 0.53% || 1.33% |- | {{Bag2|Revive}} || N/A || 0.33% || 0.53% || 1.33% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Max Revive}} || N/A || 0.01% || 0.22% || 1.06% |}
===Table du taux d'obtention avec Perte de bonus===
After Reaching Unova, the drop chance for items in Johto will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
{| class="wikitable collapsible collapsed" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xAttack}} || 6 || 64.29% || 64.29% || 64.29% |- | {{Pokemon|Graveler}} || N/A || 10.71% || 10.71% || 10.71% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Green Shard}} || N/A || 12.00% || 12.00% || 12.00% |- | {{Bag2|Grey Shard}} || N/A || 12.00% || 12.00% || 12.00% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Iron Plate}} || N/A || 0.22% || 0.22% || 0.22% |- | {{Bag2|Stone Plate}} || N/A || 0.22% || 0.22% || 0.22% |- | {{Bag2|Earth Plate}} || N/A || 0.22% || 0.22% || 0.22% |- | {{Bag2|Draco Plate}} || N/A || 0.22% || 0.22% || 0.22% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Ultraball}} || N/A || 0.03% || 0.03% || 0.03% |- | {{Bag2|Large Restore}} || N/A || 0.03% || 0.03% || 0.03% |- | {{Bag2|Revive}} || N/A || 0.03% || 0.03% || 0.03% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Max Revive}} || N/A || <0.01% || <0.01% || <0.01% |}
